pull.title: rfc1123Time locale fix.
pull.body:
Set time locale to POSIX in rfc1123Time so weekday/months in http responses are correct.

Rewritten version of a patch from Luke-Jr.

repo.name: bitcoin-git
repo.description: Feature branches that aren't yet, or never will be, ready for mainline bitcoin

events.message: Set time locale to POSIX in rfc1123Time so weekday/months in http responses are correct.

events.body: Tweaked this:  Use "C" instead of "POSIX", I'm not 100% sure "POSIX" is supported as a locale name on Windows.
